title: Mod~ Take a look please about Refunds
body: So my friend told me that if you dont use a certain champ or skin in less than 3 games you can return it?? So i was wondering if you can reefund my Zoe back to my rp since i bought the wrong thing... My friend did this with Irelia and i would like to refund Zoe as well please since i bought her with RP and can i also refund my pulsefire caitlyn? i wanted to see how cool it is but it wasnt that great... I only used it once as well. Dont worry Riot, once i get the RP ima use the same amount on something else, SO PLEASE REFUND THOSE TWO... IM A UNWISE PERSON whos hasnt thought this through and would like to have one more chance and get the two items back
